com.digi.xbee.api.connection.serial

Class SerialPortRxTx

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digi.xbee.api.connection.serial.AbstractSerialPort
      • com.digi.xbee.api.connection.serial.SerialPortRxTx
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConnectionInterface, gnu.io.CommPortOwnershipListener, gnu.io.SerialPortEventListener, EventListener

    public class SerialPortRxTx
extends AbstractSerialPort
implements gnu.io.SerialPortEventListener, gnu.io.CommPortOwnershipListener
    This class represents a serial port using the RxTx library to communicate with it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SerialPortRxTx

        public SerialPortRxTx(String port,
                      int baudRate)
        Class constructor. Instances a new SerialPortRxTx object using the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        port - Serial port name to use.
        baudRate - Serial port baud rate, the rest of parameters will be set by default.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if port == null.
        See Also:
        AbstractSerialPort.DEFAULT_DATA_BITS, AbstractSerialPort.DEFAULT_FLOW_CONTROL, AbstractSerialPort.DEFAULT_PARITY, AbstractSerialPort.DEFAULT_STOP_BITS, AbstractSerialPort.DEFAULT_PORT_TIMEOUT, SerialPortRxTx(String, int, int), SerialPortRxTx(String, SerialPortParameters), SerialPortRxTx(String, SerialPortParameters, int), SerialPortParameters

      • SerialPortRxTx

        public SerialPortRxTx(String port,
                      int baudRate,
                      int receiveTimeout)
        Class constructor. Instances a new SerialPortRxTx object using the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        port - Serial port name to use.
        baudRate - Serial port baud rate, the rest of parameters will be set by default.
        receiveTimeout - Serial port receive timeout in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if receiveTimeout < 0.
        NullPointerException - if port == null.
        See Also:
        AbstractSerialPort.DEFAULT_DATA_BITS, AbstractSerialPort.DEFAULT_FLOW_CONTROL, AbstractSerialPort.DEFAULT_PARITY, AbstractSerialPort.DEFAULT_STOP_BITS, SerialPortRxTx(String, int), SerialPortRxTx(String, SerialPortParameters), SerialPortRxTx(String, SerialPortParameters, int), SerialPortParameters

        Parameters:
        port - Serial port name to use.
        parameters - Serial port parameters.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if port == null or if parameters == null.
        See Also:

        public SerialPortRxTx(String port,
                      SerialPortParameters parameters,
                      int receiveTimeout)
        Class constructor. Instances a new SerialPortRxTx object using the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        port - Serial port name to use.
        parameters - Serial port parameters.
        receiveTimeout - Serial port receive timeout in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if receiveTimeout < 0.
        NullPointerException - if port == null or if parameters == null.
